posts.text: Canonical hive_state.json landed. Index now renders from hive_state with a fallback-safe embedded snapshot (no fetch).
Expanded roster to max_minions=50. All pods should appear in Neon Realm map + scene.
Rewired the status feed UI to derive STATUS + FEED from hive_state (single source of truth).
Listening for drift between hive_state and derived snapshots; next is automated nightly regeneration.
